verses.verse: Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH376> who doesn't <WH1980> walk in the counsel <WH6098> of the wicked, <WH7563> nor stand <WH5975> in the way <WH1870> of sinners, <WH2400> nor sit <WH3427> in the seat <WH4186> of scoffers; <WH3887>
but his delight <WH2656> is in Yahweh <WH3068>'s law. <WH8451> On his law <WH8451> he meditates <WH1897> day <WH3119> and night. <WH3915>

He will be like a tree <WH6086> planted <WH8362> by the streams <WH6388> of water, <WH4325> that brings forth <WH5414> its fruit <WH6529> in its season, <WH6256> whose leaf <WH5929> also does not wither. <WH5034> Whatever he does <WH6213> shall prosper. <WH6743>
The wicked <WH7563> are not so, <WH4671> but are like the chaff which the wind <WH7307> drives away. <WH5086>
Therefore the wicked <WH7563> shall not stand <WH6965> in the judgment, <WH4941> nor sinners <WH2400> in the congregation <WH5712> of the righteous. <WH6662>
For Yahweh <WH3068> knows <WH3045> the way <WH1870> of the righteous, <WH6662> but the way <WH1870> of the wicked <WH7563> shall perish. <WH6>
